com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.voice

Class NavigationSpeechPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.voice.NavigationSpeechPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpeechPlayer

    public class NavigationSpeechPlayer
extends Object
implements SpeechPlayer
    Used to play SpeechAnnouncements.

    Takes a SpeechPlayerProvider which will provide either a MapboxSpeechPlayer or AndroidSpeechPlayer based on the given language - if it is supported by our Voice API.

    MapboxSpeechPlayer requires Internet connectivity. In cases where a connection is not available, the provider will fall back to the AndroidSpeechPlayer.

    Since:
    0.16.0

      • setMuted

        public void setMuted(boolean isMuted)
        Mutes or un-mutes the SpeechPlayer.

        If an announcement is playing at the time this method is called, the announcement will be stopped immediately.

        Specified by:
        setMuted in interface SpeechPlayer
        Parameters:
        isMuted - true to mute, false to un-mute
        Since:
        0.16.0

      • onOffRoute

        public void onOffRoute()
        Optional method to implement in an OffRouteListener.

        During an off-route scenario, you can use this method to cancel existing announcements without completely muting the player.

        Specified by:
        onOffRoute in interface SpeechPlayer
        Since:
        0.16.0

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Required method to implement in FragmentActivity.onDestroy() or Fragment.onDestroy().

        Ensures the player is properly shutdown and finishes any running announcements.

        Specified by:
        onDestroy in interface SpeechPlayer
        Since:
        0.16.0
